page.title: 16LINDFIELD COMMON
page.content: LINDFIELD COMMON LINDFIELD COMMIN IS THE CENTRE FOR A VARIETY OF SPORTING AND SOCIAL ACTIVITIES.AS WELL AS CRICKET AND FOOTBALL OTHER SPORTS SUCH AS TENNIS AND BOWLS HAVE FACILITIES PROVIDED FOR THEM.OCCASIONALLY THE TRADITIONAL SUSSEX GAME OF STOOLBALL IS PLAYED.IN ADDITION TO ADULT ACTIVITIES ,THE SCHOOL IN THE CORNER OF THE COMMON USE IT FOR GAMES AND ACTIVITIES. THERE IS AN ANNUAL CELEBRATION OF VILLAGE DAY ON THE COMMON TAKING THE FORM OF A FETE.AFTER A TORCH-LIGHT PARADE THROUGH THE VILLAGE, GUY FAWKES IS REMEMBERED WITH A BONFIRE ON THE COMMON ORGANISED BY THE VERY ACTIVE BONFIRE SOCIETY.THE P.T.A.,OFTHE VILLAGE INFANTAND JUNIOR SCHOOLS USE THE COMMON FIR THEIR ANNUAL FETE.USUALLY THERE IS AN ANNUAL VISIT FROM A TRAVELLING CIRCUS AND FUN FAIR.
